Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundsListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player, Trash

    abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoundsListener
    An abstract class that represents a moving component/image of the game.
    Author:
    Zelinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean isAtBottom
      The boolean representing whether or not the Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds Rectangle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs an Entity.

    • Field Detail

      • isAtBottom

        protected boolean isAtBottom
        The boolean representing whether or not the Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds Rectangle. Objects that extend Entity may need access to this attribute.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        Entity(int x,
       int y,
       int width,
       int height)
        Constructs an Entity. Creates a Bounds for the Entity representing its size and location.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the Bounds
        y - The y position of the Bounds
        width - The width of the Bounds
        height - The height of the Bounds
        See Also:
        Bounds

    • Method Detail

      • setWorldBounds

        void setWorldBounds(Bounds worldBounds)
        Sets the Bounds of the world for this Entity. An Entity can't move outside of the worldBounds.
        Parameters:
        worldBounds - A Bounds representing the bounds of the world

      • getBounds

        Bounds getBounds()
        Returns the Bounds representing the position for the Entity
        Returns:
        The Bounds representing the position for the Entity

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(int x,
                 int y)
        Sets the location of the Bounds representing the position of the Entity to the specified x and y position.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x position of the Bounds
        y - The new y position of the Bounds

      • translate

        void translate(double dx,
               double dy)
        Translates the Bounds representing the Entity's location a distance specified by the change in x and y. Will not allow for the Entity to move outside of the worldBounds.
        Parameters:
        dx - The distance to translate the Bounds in the x direction
        dy - The distance to translate the Bounds in the y direction

      • intersects

        boolean intersects(Entity e)
        Checks if this Entity's Bounds intersects the specified Entity's Bounds.
        Parameters:
        e - The other Entity
        Returns:
        True if this Entity's Bounds intersects the other Entity's Bounds, false otherwise

      • setSpeed

        void setSpeed(int dx,
              int dy)
        Sets the speed of the Entity in the x and y direction. The Entity moves according to its speed.
        Parameters:
        dx - The new speed of the Entity in the x direction
        dy - The new speed of the Entity in the y direction

      • getCurrentHealth

        int getCurrentHealth()
        Returns the current health of the Entity.
        Returns:
        The current health of the Entity.

      • getMaxHealth

        int getMaxHealth()
        Returns the maximum health of the Entity.
        Returns:
        The maximum health of the Entity.

      • atBottom

        boolean atBottom()
        Checks to see if the Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds.
        Returns:
        True if Entity is at the bottom of the worldBounds, false otherwise

      • update

        void update(double gravity,
            double drag)
        Updates the position of the Entity's BOunds based on gravity, drag, and the Entity's speed. The Entity will not be updated if it is stopped.
        Parameters:
        gravity - The gravity applied to the Entity
        drag - The drag applied to the Entity

      • toggleStopped

        void toggleStopped()
        Toggles whether the Entity moves or not when updated. If the Entity is stopped, it will not move when updated.

      • leftBound

        boolean leftBound()
        Checks if the Entity's Bounds is touching the left of the worldBounds.
        Returns:
        True if the Entity's Bounds is touching the left of the worldBounds, false otherwise

      • rightBound

        boolean rightBound()
        Checks if the Entity's Bounds is touching the right of the worldBounds.
        Returns:
        True if the Entity's Bounds is touching the right of the worldBounds, false otherwise

      • topBound

        boolean topBound()
        Checks if the Entity's Bounds is touching the top of the worldBounds.
        Returns:
        True if the Entity's Bounds is touching the top of the worldBounds, false otherwise

      • bottomBound

        boolean bottomBound()
        Checks if the Entity's Bounds is touching the bottom of the worldBounds.
        Returns:
        True if the Entity's Bounds is touching the bottom of the worldBounds, false otherwise

      • handleSetLocation

        public void handleSetLocation(int x,
                              int y)
        Sets the location of the worldBounds to the specified x and y location.
        Specified by:
        handleSetLocation in interface BoundsListener
        Parameters:
        x - The new x location for the worldBounds
        y - The new y location for the worldBounds

        public void handleTranslate(int dx,
                            int dy)
        Translates the worldBounds a distance specified by the change in x and y.
        Specified by:
        handleTranslate in interface BoundsListener
        Parameters:

        dy - The y distance to translate the worldBounds by
